short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for tracking office hours, calculates end time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly manage your time with the TimeTrekker Pro Chrome extension, your ultimate companion for productivity. With just a click, project your workday's end time, automatically adjusting to 8 hours on Fridays for optimal scheduling. But that's not all - our latest update introduces a powerful new feature: activity tracking. Seamlessly monitor your time spent on various tasks by adding tickets for each activity. From project management to personal productivity, TimeTrekker Pro enhances your workflow, ensuring efficient time allocation and timely project completion. Experience the perfect blend of traditional time tracking and modern activity monitoring, all within your browser.
